title: Spicy bulgur wheat salad
ingredients: ['100g bulgur wheat', '300ml vegetable stock', '1 red onion, finely sliced', '2 large tomatoes, diced', '1 red, yellow or green pepper, finely sliced', '1 large bunch of parsley, chives or mint, finely chopped', 'For the dressing', '1 lemon, juiced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pinch cumin powder, or to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
